title: 5.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Design and code a simple Photo Gallery app on Thunkable. The app should use the Camera component to capture pictures and display them on the screen.Capture and display a minimum of fi ve pictures on the screen with this app.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
